definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: Zhang is prepared for exhausting military exercises.
sentences.chinese: 張陽已經準備好迎接疲憊的軍事訓練了。

sentences.english: Military training for college students is a very important part of the education of national defense.
sentences.chinese: 大學生軍事訓練是國防教育的一部分。

sentences.english: He should vote for compulsory military training for the horse.
sentences.chinese: 他提議對馬進行必要的軍事訓練。

sentences.english: South Korea is now expected to stage the military drills Monday or Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 南韓預期在星期一和星期二上演軍事訓練。

sentences.english: He was poached from a classroom and shipped straight off for military training.
sentences.chinese: 他在教室裏被人強行帶走，直接加入了軍事訓練。
軍事訓練使他變得不再敏感。

sentences.english: The students were regimented into large groups for military training.
sentences.chinese: 學生們被編成大組進行軍事訓練。

sentences.english: We will pay special attention to military training to produce highly skilled military personnel.
sentences.chinese: 狠抓軍事訓練，培養高素質軍事人才。

sentences.english: I’m sure this military drill was a wonder to see in its rapid fire execution.
sentences.chinese: 我相信這一軍事訓練在速射時有着非凡的表現。

sentences.english: You would go on military training perhaps together.
Military training is filled with obstacle courses.
sentences.chinese: 軍事訓練中充滿了障礙課程。

sentences.english: Military training during the period of Anti-Japanese War .
sentences.chinese: 抗戰期間，嶺南大學學生接受軍事訓練。

sentences.english: Then we started to do military training at an anti-communism and anti-Japanese university.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們在反共反日大學開始進行軍事訓練。

sentences.english: A new round of military training kicked off the reform, the exercise stroboscopic bright spot market.
sentences.chinese: 新一輪軍事訓練改革序幕拉開，演兵場上亮點頻閃。

sentences.english: Some people think that riding a white boat is also a military training.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲，踏白船也是一種軍事訓練。

sentences.english: Thought originally to have been designed for military training, the game began to be played more widely during the Han.
sentences.chinese: 人們最早認爲蹴鞠是爲軍事訓練而設計的。

definition: abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
